bugs: As you can see this Apk and ModulePack works.
It also offers the comfort of KnownBugs and other Networking things
On 10.26.5.0, if you open Snapchat from a Notification, the old design will fail to load for some reason. You need to close and re-open Snapchat in this case to get to the old UI.
As you can see this Apk and ModulePack works.
It also offers the comfort of KnownBugs and other Networking things
And... actually there are no other Known Bugs
